department: MINISTER OF PUBLIC WORKS & GOVERNMENT SERVICES
short_summary: Procurement for hydraulic press brake and ironworker press
description: Canadian Coast Guard requires hydraulic press brake and hydraulic ironworker press in Parry Sound, Ontario.
full_summary:
**[Tender Announcement] # RFP - Hydraulic Press Brake and Hydraulic Ironworker Press**
=====================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a **Request for Proposal (RFP) - Hydraulic Press Brake and Hydraulic Ironworker Press** solicitation under reference number WS3859257268.

**Key Details**
---------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3859257268
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Publication Date**: February 8, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 15, 2023 (14:00:00)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Applicable

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Supply Requirements**
----------------------

*   **Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)** requires one (1) Hydraulic Press Brake and one (1) Hydraulic Ironworker Press to be delivered to Parry Sound, Ontario.
*   **Delivery Deadline**: April 28, 2023

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

*   **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   **Contact Person**: Laila Figueredo
    *   **Email**: <laila.figueredo@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Notice and Attachments**
------------------------

*   Please refer to the official tender notice on the [Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15359576?extsite=MTUzNTk1NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website for additional details.
*   No attachments are available at this time.

**Note**:
Due to the tender's expired status, this announcement serves as an informational reference only.
